content.math_content: \begin{array}{l} I = \oiint_ {S} x ^ {3} d y d z + y ^ {3} d z d x + z ^ {3} d x d y = 3 \iiint_ {a} (x ^ {2} + y ^ {2} + z ^ {2}) d v \\ = 3 \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} d \theta \int_ {0} ^ {\pi} d \varphi \int_ {0} ^ {1} r ^ {4} \sin \varphi d r = \frac {6 \pi}{5} \int_ {0} ^ {\pi} \sin \varphi d \varphi = \frac {1 2 \pi}{5}. \\ \end{array}

paragraph_content.content: 同阶而非等价的无穷小，应选(B).
线性相关，则存在不全为零的数
，即至少有一个向量可由其余向量线性表示，
线性无关的充分必要条件是
中任意一个向量都不可由其余向量线性表示，应选(D).
且其中任两个向量线性无关, 但向量组
线性相关, 排除(C), 应选(D).

content.math_content: \frac {\partial^ {2} u}{\partial x ^ {2}} = \frac {1}{y} f ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {x}{y}\right) - \frac {y}{x ^ {2}} g ^ {\prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) + \frac {y}{x ^ {2}} g ^ {\prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) + \frac {y ^ {2}}{x ^ {3}} g ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) = \frac {1}{y} f ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {x}{y}\right) + \frac {y ^ {2}}{x ^ {3}} g ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right),

\frac {\partial^ {2} u}{\partial x \partial y} = - \frac {x}{y ^ {2}} f ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {x}{y}\right) + \frac {1}{x} g ^ {\prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) - \frac {1}{x} g ^ {\prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) - \frac {y}{x ^ {2}} g ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right) = - \frac {x}{y ^ {2}} f ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {x}{y}\right) - \frac {y}{x ^ {2}} g ^ {\prime \prime} \left(\frac {y}{x}\right),

paragraph_content.content: x\frac{\partial^2u}{\partial x^2} +y\frac{\partial^2u}{\partial x\partial y} = \frac{x}{y} f''\left(\frac{x}{y}\right) + \frac{y^2}{x^2} g''\left(\frac{y}{x}\right) - \frac{x}{y} f''\left(\frac{x}{y}\right) - \frac{y^2}{x^2} g''\left(\frac{y}{x}\right) = 0.
所以曲线积分与路径无关，

W = k\int_{\overline{BO}}\frac{-x\mathrm{d}x + (1 - y)\mathrm{d}y}{[x^2 + (1 - y)^2]^{\frac{3}{2}}} = k\int_{2}^{0}\frac{-x\mathrm{d}x}{(x^2 + 1)^{\frac{3}{2}}} = k\left(1 - \frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}\right).

paragraph_content.content: P\left\{X + Y < \frac{6}{5}\right\} = \iint_{x + y \leqslant \frac{6}{5}} f(x, y) \mathrm{d}x \mathrm{~d}y = 1 - \iint_{x + y > \frac{6}{5}} f(x, y) \mathrm{d}x \mathrm{~d}y
F_{Y}(y) = P\{Y \leqslant y\} = P\{1 - \sqrt[3]{X} \leqslant y\} = P\{X \geqslant (1 - y)^{3}\}
